Package com.sicomsa.dmt.svc

Class AuthenticationSvc

java.lang.Object
com.sicomsa.dmt.svc.AbstractSvc<Authorization,Object>
com.sicomsa.dmt.svc.AuthenticationSvc
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service<Authorization,Object>
public class AuthenticationSvc extends AbstractSvc<Authorization,Object>
Extends AbstractSvc to provide a concrete implementation of the WS defined to authenticate:
"https://cfdidescargamasivasolicitud.clouda.sat.gob.mx/Autenticacion/Autenticacion.svc"

This class has concrete methods to create a SOAPMessage and sign it in order to request an authorization token. And parse the response to provide an Authorization which provides methods to wrap the token and determine its validity.

Since:
1.0
Version:
2025.01.04
Author:
Beto Lopez

    • addSignedContent

      protected void addSignedContent(jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPMessage message, Credentials creds, Object request) throws jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException, GeneralSecurityException
      Adds content to the specified SOAPMessage using the specified credentials and signs the content according to the WSDL.
      Specified by:
      addSignedContent in class AbstractSvc<Authorization,Object>
      Parameters:
      message - message to add content to and sign
      creds - credentials to use
      request - additional data, can be null
      Throws:
      jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPException - if there were SOAP related problems
      GeneralSecurityException - if there were security related problems
      SvcSignatureException - if there were other signature related problems
      NullPointerException - if message or creds are null
